article: Mr. Jackson is a  _  and he lives in a small village.He hardly ever goes to the town  because  he always works in the fields. .It was the last  _  of June. He drove to the town to  buy  some new clothes for his wife and his children. He  got  there after twenty minutes.It was Sunday, and the street was  _  of people. He couldn't find a  _  to park his car.  At last  he found there was no car in front of a building. He was very  _  .Then he parked it there at once and  _  shopping. Two hours  _  the farmer went back to his car  _  many things in his hands. To his surprise , he saw a policeman  _  by his car. "Do you know you can't park here, sir?" Asked the  _  . "I'm sorry I don't." Answered Mr. Jackson. "Look at the sign, please." The policeman said  _  . "I did. Doesn't it say 'Fine for parking'? So I parked it here!" Said Mr. Jackson.
